name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: IRyS addresses the audience during an MC segment, teasing upcoming guest performances and a major announcement.
IRyS performs a high-energy solo of the song 'ROCKIN' HARDCORE'.
A visual interlude as IRyS transitions from her solo to a duet performance.
IRyS is joined by Yuzuki Choco for a collaborative performance of 'LEVEL5 -judgelight-'.

subtitles.original: この後もね、ゲスト曲はたくさんあり、
subtitles.english: There are many guest songs after this,

subtitles.original: なんと最後の方に重大発表もありますんで、
subtitles.english: and there will also be a major announcement towards the end,

subtitles.original: 最後まで一緒に楽しんで盛り上げていきましょう！
subtitles.english: so let's enjoy and heat things up together until the very end!

subtitles.original: Please stay tuned as we have a lot of guest songs coming up
subtitles.english: Please stay tuned as we have a lot of guest songs coming up

subtitles.original: and I have a big, big, big announcement to share with y'all as well.
subtitles.english: and I have a big, big, big announcement to share with y'all as well.

subtitles.original: So excited, so make sure you watch it until the end.
subtitles.english: So excited, so make sure you watch it until the end.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Please listen to ROCKIN' HARDCORE.
subtitles.english: Please listen to ROCKIN' HARDCORE.

subtitles.original: 響きあう 願いが今 覚醒めてく
subtitles.english: The resonating wishes are awakening now

subtitles.original: 譲れない 未来のために
subtitles.english: For the sake of a future I won't give up on

subtitles.original: 巡りあう 運命を 越えたその先に
subtitles.english: Beyond the destiny we've encountered

subtitles.original: この想い 輝くから
subtitles.english: Because these feelings will shine
